website_summaries.verdict: Available in a 3.4 oz. bottle, this cleansing face wash controls oil, keeps skin clear, and exfoliates to provide a soft but not dry exterior.
pros: Does a good job clearing facial oil without drying skin out
Conditions skin to be ready for shaving
cons: May not be best for sensitive or extra dry skin types

customer_reviews.title: Don't find it worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a nice facial scrub, however there are a few drawbacks. Those little beads get stuck in my beard on occasion, scrub scent isn't great, wish it was in cream form instead of liquid form, and the cost is way too much. This product does have good cleaning power, and a semi-refreshing quality. I've been trying a lot of different facial scrubs/cleaners to find what works for me. This one doesn't, though the ManCave Olivestone scrub does, and it's 1/4 the price. Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Loiselle

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth checking out with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Quality product with good ingredients. - Doesn't dry my face as much as other products. - I can see some improvement in overall tone in my face (Please note that I haven't had this product long, however, still notice some improvement even if it's subtle). - Fast shipping (product arrived sooner than expected) - Good overall size (contains roughly 8 oz) - Customer service (Rugged & Dapper reached out to see if everything was ok and if they needed to rectify anything) Cons: - Price may deter some people. - All-in-one product (not necessarily a bad thing but some may be skeptical of a product claiming to do multiple things in one product).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can confirm - the price is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This facial cleanser is great! A little goes a long way. It has a citrus-y scent - it does smell nice. Don't expect it to linger, but a face wash's scent shouldn't linger anyways. It does a great job of washing away dead skin, and I've noticed how the toner is working. I've had this face wash for about a month, now. I plan on ordering another bottle soon. I'll probably be out within the next couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash hands down - use a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin, this face was is great! I switched from dermalogica, a $70 face was to this with no issues! My face is clear and skin in hydrated. I would recommend using a moisturizer after though because it does a good job at cleaning deep. I use the moisturizer this company makes as well.
customer_reviews.author: dw_qc

customer_reviews.title: No cons from me
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this entire line up. This face wash has a nice gentle scrubbing effect and leaves my skin feeling deeply cleansed without feeling dry or tight. I follow up with their moisturizer which has a nice weight to it that doesn't leave your skin feeling greasy and shiny. I'm far from a chemist so I can't speak about the benefits of the ingredients and ”botanicals" they use in their products but I can say, for me personally, they work as I expect them to, they clean, they mosturize, and I haven't had any negative side effects. I will be purchasing all these products again. Facial cleanser, moisturizer, lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I supplement this face wash with a scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid face wash and is gentle on my face, but it's not deep cleaning. In addition to this face wash, I recommend you also get an intense facial scrub that you use 2-3x that will limit white and black heads and will keep your pores on your nose from enlarging. I have to use an intensive scrub and black mask to get rid of my white and black heads. This face wash doesn't really help with this issue. The goods news is I am buying it again because it keeps my face in good shape, smells good, and I have to admit, the black bottle is aesthetically pleasing for me.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Hey!  You, with the face!
customer_reviews.text: That's what people will be saying after you use this. It's amazing. This is the ONLY facial cleanser I've used where I've seen immediate results. It doesn't dry out your skin whatsoever and makes it nice and smooth. If you have a significant other, they're going to all over your face because it'll look so good. Trust me, buy this stuff. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carstensen

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I felt stupid splurging on face wash, but WOW it's worth it. This stuff makes my face feel so clean and moisturized. Can use it daily with no issues. It doesn't dry my skin out or make it feel weird. The scent is not my absolute favorite, but it's fine. Try this stuff out, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: JNeiman

customer_reviews.title: What the smell is this?
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a natural face wash and this was recommended in an article. Price is higher than it should be. Barely any particles in it to justify calling it a scrub. My biggest issue though is the scent. It literally smells like 409 or some other cleaning solution you wouldn’t put in your face. This is not an exaggeration. If you are someone that has purchased this I encourage you to compare the two. I am not sure what they were going for but it is quite strange. I will finish the bottle but will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: A Big Miss
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this but the quality left a lot to be desired. My skin felt like it had been cleaned well after use but the amount it dried out my skin was definitely too much. Even using this once every three days dried my skin out to the extreme. If your skin doesn't react like mine to this, it can definitely work as my skin did feel cleaner. The scent is nothing to write home about but not bad by any measure. Worth the shot for those with less sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: timothy teachout

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It may be to early to tell but so far so good. My face feels great after this and looks good. I also use on the back of my neck since I break out there and I havent had new breakouts but like I said to early to tell but just like my face it's very smooth and feels great back there. I do like the scent and it hasnt been hard on my skin. And I'd have to say my skin is pretty sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Typical Brickell quality
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't tried any Brickell products, you need to. I have used the Rugged & Dapper product and I love it. it is a crisp, clean scent to it and does a good job exfoliating your . I have also used the scar cream. The portions should be bigger, but it is also packed with good stuff. I have noticed a little difference. but I expect further improvement with continued use.
customer_reviews.author: D Mars 23

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash. Great smell and exfoliates skin really well
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th time buying this stuff and it's simply great. Usually face washes dry my skin out terribly but this stuff actually removes the dry skin and dirt and prevents me from having dry flakey skin Pros: Exfoliates well. Has a nice rugged smell. Gentle on my skin. Cons: None really Conclusion: Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Kody F.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I get that people have different skin types and this product might not be for everyone, but it works for me. I had an area on the left side of my chin and mouth that had been breaking out constantly for the last year. Tried many different products, most made it worse, the rest did nothing. This I could feel and see a difference within the first few days. 2 weeks in now, and my entire face has cleared up and feels great everyday. Also, got the shampoo/ body wash and moisturizer and they both are equally as good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed. I have the moisturizer and it works great for my face and helps with razor burns. So thought I'd try the cleanser and boy it isn't as great. It does not lather up reasonably at all and the beads are almost too thick that they just stick to your face and body even after trying to rinse it off under the shower. It does smell pretty good however. I've only used it for a week but I can tell it isn't a good product at least for me. Doesn't feel like an exfoliant whatsover. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: bman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive AH but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works but doesn’t make my face feel dry, bummer kinda also since it feels like sand on my face when scrubbing. Started using this to get my face less greasy and it works. Only bummer is having to use 2 products when showering now. Kinda pricey ( really pricey actually) $8 gets me soap for 6 months at Walmart but my girl likes it better and says it smells good.
customer_reviews.author: jessie gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin but daily washing with regular soap and water has kept me from having any pimples for more than 30 years; one week with this product and my skin is breaking out like I'm a teenager again. It smells great, but left my skin slightly greasy. From other reviews it sounds like it works well for most skin types, but if you have naturally oily skin like I do, avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I did A LOT of research before choosing and buying a cleanser. I was a little on the fence because of how expensive this little bottle is but from the reviews, this looked like the best choice. After using it for the past week, I love it. I like the sense of exfoliation, the smell and the color of it. As for the quantity needed, you don't need much to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wakes Up My Face
customer_reviews.text: I'm often looking for a cleanser that feels good, freshens my face, and isn't crazy expense. I haven't had this long so I can't say I look 10 years younger because of it, but it DOES THE JOB NICELY. Solid product. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lemberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does more drying your face out than it does moisturizing. It works well with cleaning though. I can tell the difference when I forget or don’t get to use it at night, I’ll wake up with a blemish or two. After using it, it dries up the blemishes and keeps them from getting worse. The smell isn’t great but it doesn’t smell bad. It just smells like a cleanser. My face really feels clean after I use it. I will be ordering again. Make sure you have good lotion if you use this everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff - nice smell and consistency and it has something in it to give it some texture. It's not the micro beads (I know those are bad for the environment) but it gives a similar scrubbing feel - would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Karate

customer_reviews.title: Overrated.
customer_reviews.text: Good: Branding is nice, I guess Bad: Just didn't work. Used it for a solid month and acne is exactly the same. Used it with the face moisturizer of the same brand, hoping they'd work well together. Just didn't work, switched back to cetaphil because it seems to work better and it's much cheaper. Waste of $25 (or $50 if you count the moisturizer).
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: It give me skin rashes
customer_reviews.text: So I was trying a new product for my oily face, i saw this product on top of the list for "facial foam" in Amazon and decided to try it. Tried for the first few days, it works great, but after that it develop rashes in my skin, it's like a small pimple and bright red in color. Anyway, the scent is good, but the rest i think have bad effect on my skin. I'll avoid this product next time
customer_reviews.author: vincent lieswanto

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, pretty happy with it. The company wants you to use it twice a day for obvious reasons but you should only exfoliate 3 times a week max! Not much of a scent which is whatever but I find it does moisturize quite nice. A nice balance between lather and scrub aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Solid daily scrub
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Keils face wash for a while now and decided to try another (less expensive) brand. Kiels product felt much more abrasive which I personally like. However this product especially considering the price difference is worth a look.
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve tried so far
customer_reviews.text: Great cleanser. The exfoliant is gentle enough for daily use, it smells nice and leaves my skin less oily throughout the day. I also like that it has MSM in it, which you don’t see in a lot of men’s specific cosmetics and is great for skin in a lot of ways. The only other cleanser I really liked (and I’ve tried many) was Ursa Major’s and I already prefer this one. Will definitely be buying another bottle when this one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Dude Guy

customer_reviews.title: Even for the "Macho Man", It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a male friend who had very, very dry skin. He would not have purchased it for himself as he is of the opinion that men don't purchase "moisturizers". So, I gave him a tube as a gift. It has done wonders. It worked so well that he now purchases it himself. It has made that much of a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Over hyped... under performing
customer_reviews.text: It’s just your basic, average face scrub... but at high end cost. Don’t waste your money. You can get the $7 stuff at a store and it’s just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Teasdale

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Cleanser/Scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt my favorite cleanser I've ever used. I have sensitive skin and it's a challenge to find something that works without drying out your skin. I haven't had a bleamish or ingrown hair since I started using the product. It also makes the shaving process much more enjoyable. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ReznBenz

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a citrus cleaning product
customer_reviews.text: Can't say how effective this was as a face soap as after using it several times I could not get over the fact that it overwhelmingly smells like an spray citrus cleaning production you use to clean the kitchen counters.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I Like This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and for years I used the kids face cleaner with limited results. I tried RUGGED & DAPPER based on a magazine article and I must tell you it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oldaker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I have oily and sensitive skin and the scrub is perfect for me. Has eliminated some of the redness I had and has cleared my skin up as well. Use before shaving and no more ingrown hairs. Marks from previous ingrown hairs have gone away. A little goes a long way. Let the product do the work. Will order the moisturizer now. Nice job R&D!
customer_reviews.author: LVGolfer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a rash
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend that you don’t buys this product. It made my skin very irritated dry and red.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schillo

customer_reviews.title: Is good. I'll order a new one next month.
customer_reviews.text: I think is great, my face looks clean after I wash it with this product. I've only used Neutrogena and some other soaps from Walmart, and my face still looks dirty and oily. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have used every product. Ever. From proactive to clean and clear to legit every item at the store to every prescription topical as well as ACUTAIN (spelling) as a teenager. Now 24. I would and still do occasionally break out but this product I have been using for 2 years. No complains, works well. Still the occasion zit or whatever but I will continue to get this product as it’s a daily scrub and I don’t ever have an oily face anymore
customer_reviews.author: Jack P.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, he loves it! Says he’s never going back to his old face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something I can use that would make my face feel and smell clean without drying out. This was great! You don’t need much either. I used it every 2-3 days and the bottle lasted about 3 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: EZ Sol

customer_reviews.title: Great face scrub.
customer_reviews.text: I have searched my whole life for a face wash that cleans my greasy face and washes off clean and fresh. This is the best I've found so far. I'm not saying it is perfect - still haven't found that one yet - but this is by far the best so far. I wish it was a little cheaper, but I know that there are scrubs much more expensive than Rugged & Dapper. Highly recommended. (By the way, ladies, my wife HATES this face wash. She doesn't like the smell or the texture. So it's all mine.)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The best I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a number of different products over the past year trying to find the perfect face wash and so far this is the best one. It smells good, it does a great job of cleaning, it has exfoliants, and its all natural. I will definitely purchase this again and can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Landon L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, I have been using it for a while
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product regularly for a few years now. I use it in the morning while in the shower just for my face, and I miss it if I run out or if I travel and forget it. It goes on well and rinses clean. The exfoliation beads are noticeable but not harsh at all and I have even come to look forward to it. Most importantly is that the 8oz container lasts quite a while. I use it just about every day and I get around 5 months of usage out of one bottle. I follow up this with the Rugged & Dapper facial moisturizer after shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Palecek

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this daily and I really like it! I wish the opening were a little smaller so that you could control how much you use more easily, but it's not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Stinks like window cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop using this. It has a very strong scent that smells just like windex. Even after washing it off I smell like I sprayed my face with straight windex.
customer_reviews.author: lemmonysnippets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing daily scrubber
customer_reviews.text: I used dapper daily face wash a while ago, was impressed with the way it cleansed my face but then switched to other brands because dapper was costly for me. Tried around 5 different face wash but ended up buying dapper again. It's soo good once you use it you don't like other products. Only disadvantage is there is no smell to it, I like a little smell on my face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Divakar Jayaraman

customer_reviews.title: Toilet bowl scented.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, it's never dried out my skin and does the job well. BUT, for some inexplicable reason, they decided to make it smell like bathroom cleaner. I paid a lot of money for it so I'm going to continue using it until the bottle is empty, but to be clear it's quite nauseating to scrub my face everyday with a scent that is indistinguishable from the stuff I use to clean my toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad face soap. Helped keep the face clean. Wasn't a fan of the beads cause they feel like plastic rather than grit. Smell was so-so. Still worth 5 stars though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kalb

customer_reviews.title: Harsh Scent
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for the exfoliation, but it has an unnecessarily harsh scent that I don't think is healthy. I'll still be using it, but I don't think I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior citizen with cyclic skin problems, plus sensitive skin. Used with the complete kit, this product is the only one that not only controls skin problems, but actually corrects moderate acne scarring. I wasn't expecting that. So, imagine my surprise and delight. This is now my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sexton

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star face wash!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Brickell, Jack Black and numerous other men’s face wash but Rugged and Dapper is hands down the best. Whenever you open the cap you can see and smell the quality. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome daily scrub!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! I’ve tried many facial scrubs in the past but I’ve never stayed with one I like, and enjoy using. Other products feel like you’re scrubbing or washing your face with ground up shells or sand ; the Rugged and Dapper daily scrub feels strong enough that you can tell it’s exfoliating but gentle enough that it’s not going to scar up your face!! It’s a great product, and thoroughly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Pelaez

customer_reviews.title: Nothing great
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it's decent but there are so many other cleaners that work just as well for a fraction of the price and smell better.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Rice

customer_reviews.title: Best men’s skin products on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that I use daily with the Rugged Dapper skin moisturizer. Along with using the Rugged Dapper face mask once or twice a week my skin feels soft and looks refreshed. Best my skin has ever felt and I’m 65.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: No Fuss Facial Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Per my son who I bought this for, it has helped with his acne without drying out his skin like other facial cleansers have done. He also uses it on a daily basis because it's a no nonsense cleanser. Just lather on your face and rinse - that's it.
customer_reviews.author: tev797

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant
customer_reviews.text: A big fan of this face wash! Tried many face washes but this is really the only one I can rely on to work. Clears and prevents acne. Smells and feels great on the face. Will continue to only buy this face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this facial wash. It definitely cleans my face and does not dry it unlike other products I've used. It refreshes you face leaving it moisturized and it does help a it with my acne. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a daily face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Arowana

customer_reviews.title: I use this product in my morning and nighttime routines ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my morning and nighttime routines. I've had really dry skin on my face for quite some time. I've tried other products that rid my face of the dryness but most of them left my face looking shiny due to oil. This stuff not only treats my dry skin but leaves my face without that oily look.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Stanley

customer_reviews.title: First face wash that works and doesn't dry my face out!
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly sensitive skin and I can currently use this everyday twice a day (morning and night) with no issues such as drying my face out. It smells awesome and leaves you with a fresh face feeling. I highly recommend pairing with the Rugged and Dapper moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Less oil, exfoliates well, no shine, no flakes, no irritation
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT! My face continues to be noticeably less oily than it was throughout the day after just two days of use plus it does a great job exfoliating and not leaving my face dry or tight. The moisturizer is also amazing, no shine no flakes. Neither caused me any acne or irritation. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kitzmann

customer_reviews.title: Made face oily and increased breakouts.
customer_reviews.text: Purposely bought this product because it said that it had the deep cleaning beads but that was able to be used daily. After you later the product in your hand barely any make it to your face. Also it seems that after using it my face became more oily and had small break outs all over. I feel like I am a teen again with oily skin and red bumps all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good face cleaner option.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. Has some micro beads in it...some people might find them too abrasive, but I like the deep clean they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not prevent breakouts
customer_reviews.text: It makes your face feel "clean" but I still had breakouts. Also the wash has little hard bits for a "facial scrub" that were a pain and usually ended up stuck in my beard.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Grabek

customer_reviews.title: Dried my face out. Doesnt exfoliate at all. Horrible chemical smell. Had allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.text: It dried my face out a lot and made it very tight. I have a great moisturizer from a different company thankfully. Didnt exfoliate whatsoever. The scent was purely chemical. Like commercial grade cleaning chemical you get in 5 gallon containers and you wear a mask and hazmat suit for. Wretched. Repulsive. Awful. And i was allergic so that sucked. My face and hands very red and very itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler James

customer_reviews.title: He loves this face wash .
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as gift to the man in my life for his birthday and he loved it so much much I just ordered another bottle for Father’s Day.
customer_reviews.author: astra whipp

customer_reviews.title: Guy stuff
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t know, it was a gift for the three guys with beards in our performance group
customer_reviews.author: Kelley M. Wyskiel

customer_reviews.title: All in one cleanser does the job!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best facial cleansers I’ve used. Love that it’s a combo of a cleanser/toner/scrub for an all in one use. It says that you can use it daily but I use 2-3 times a week because I don’t like exfoliating so often. My face feels fresh and clean plus then scent is nice but not strong at all.
customer_reviews.author: E. Puma

customer_reviews.title: Poor Exfoliation and Too much perfume
customer_reviews.text: This face was does not offer the great exfoliation it promises in the ad. It has very little exfoliation. Plus, the scent is very strong and smells like perfume. I felt this product very oily as well. I wish I could return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Turned face red
customer_reviews.text: Turned my boyfriend's face red. I don't really want a scented product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gant

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and feels great. I really think this is some of the best facial cleanser I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas John Kneesel

customer_reviews.title: Great Daily Scrub it really works ( I wasn't given anything for my review)
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does work. I will say I don't break out often, however I do always begin to feel small little bumps forming. This scrub makes those bumps vanish in a day. I like the smell as well. As a guy I hate fruity smelling facial washes and this stuff has a decent smell but not a girly smell if you get me. I will continue to purchase this item glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: R S M

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done Fixes my oily face
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and u use this product before work and my skin stays oil free the whole day and my face literally looks brighter after washing it with this product. It’s worth it trust me
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought face soap before, but i enjoyed this product, and it smells amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jayrod766

customer_reviews.title: Great product. But pricy.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. But a little pricy for what it is. Loved every drop. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great...but Expensive
customer_reviews.text: If it weren’t for the price, I would have given this 5 stars. The smell is great and it is abrasive enough that you can get a good face scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Morris

customer_reviews.title: What a gentle formula it is!
customer_reviews.text: This facial wash didn't cause any redness on my cheeks, so I think it has a gentle formula. Also, it's a nice scrub as well since it's not too abrasive on my skin! I've tried cheaper alternatives, but I don't think they could measure up to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great, love it, repeat and repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I can feel dead skin wash away, leaving me with a smooth clean face, doesn't over dry or leave residue. Great quality will last a while, as all you need is a very small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband last Christmas, and he loves it! Just bought our second bottle, and remember, a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: nozamA

customer_reviews.title: It's gentle enough....
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite picky about the products that I use on my face because of my highly sensitive skin, but so far, my experience with this is great. It's gentle enough to be used every day, and it didn't make my skin too dry and irritated. This may be a facial cleanser, but the moisture this gives is comparable to creams.
customer_reviews.author: Frat

customer_reviews.title: Smells like shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: It works okay for me. It hasn't affected me in a negative way. I don't mind using it at all but I don't think I'd buy it again. The reason why is because It smells like shaving cream, which I'm not really a fan of. I'll probably look for something else that has a better scent.
customer_reviews.author: Chuehue Thao

customer_reviews.title: I Love It.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cleanser for a couple months now, and I love it. It cleans and smooths the skin without drying. The scent is mild and not overpowering. I use it in the shower before shaving and again in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heavner

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the moisturizer unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I really like their moisturizer and tried this cleanser. Unfortunately it is not as good at all. Hard to get the right amount with this packaging. Texture makes it easy to get into the eyes. The scrub part is good for this 2-in-1 though. Scent is ok. I really recommend their moisturizer but not this cleanser. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I mean how do you really know how good it is unless you want to wash 1/2 your ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product twice now and have finally decided to give it 5 stars. I mean how do you really know how good it is unless you want to wash 1/2 your face with a different product. What I can say is that before using it, I'd get a pimple now and then using a variety of other products; but since using it, not one pimple ever. Coincidence? Probably not. So I'll keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Phoneman

customer_reviews.title: Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this face wash. Like a few other recent reviewers, I have had a hard time getting over the scent. Instead of a "fresh," "clean," or "unscented" smell, it has a more chemical odor - like a household cleaner. It's a lot of money for a face wash that smells like 409 or lysol.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Dude

customer_reviews.title: Cleans face
customer_reviews.text: Didn't turn me into a new man, but my face is clean.
customer_reviews.author: N. Strobel

customer_reviews.title: I'm not being paid for this
customer_reviews.text: I like the deep scrub I feel I'm getting and the clean feel afterward. My only complaint is that it does not go on as smoothly as I'd hoped. Still, a good value.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a face wash that is made with natural ingredients, and not full of parabens, sulfates, etc. It works well and the texture is great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance and doesn't dry my skin - gentle exfoliant
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and my combination skin felt better very quickly. The scrub is gentle and smells great. Recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed with the exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: Ive recently purchased this item and im just not satisified with the product.I purchased this with the assumption that this would be good exfoliant,but since ive been using it i dont see a lot of exfoliant beads in the lotion,feels like a normal face wash.A tad bit disappointed if I were to go with the reviews
customer_reviews.author: aniketb

customer_reviews.title: Not gritty enough
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. Smells nice and gets his face clean, but according to him it doesn't have enough grit to really slough off the dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: J Milner

customer_reviews.title: Great great great! but, you may need a moisturizer...
customer_reviews.text: this product is awesome! it smells super nice. my face goes all day without being oily and my break-outs are at a MINIMUM. It can make your skin a little taut after washing, so maybe consider investing in a moisturizer :) ultimately, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Great Men's cleanser Works really well without the heavy fragrance Specific to men's skin and the unique challenge it takes to clean and restore
customer_reviews.author: michael c

customer_reviews.title: After applying it makes you face fill great
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I have tried this product and I will be reordering and also adding some other care products BTW I did get a complement on my skin the next day NO BS
customer_reviews.author: Kevin U.

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I use to think all face washes were the same. I thought about this purchase for awhile, because of the price. However I am extremely happy with this face wash so far. My face feels fresh, and actually feels smoother. If you don’t mind paying the price for it, I would highly recommend this product. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my face feeling clean, after a few days of use I can see an improvement in my skin
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty damn good!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought that this won't suit my acne-prone skin until I saw that it could even get rid of pimples. I made the purchase and used the product at once when it arrived, and so far, it's pretty damn good! It dried up my zits in no time, but it didn't dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Wash Scrub
customer_reviews.text: I’ve searched for a face wash over the years and finally found the one. The face wash scrub is the best one I’ve encountered. I’ve tried others and always went back to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Shull

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Reccomend the brand.
customer_reviews.text: I hear a lot of reports stating how the micro beads sometimes go thru or damage the filters, is this true? However the product does exactly what it's supposed to do, I use a very small amount and that works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lee

customer_reviews.title: I have oily but super sensitive skin, would not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Irritated and burned my skin...I actually got a rash from this on my neck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! This is a MUST HAVE for anyone with a big beard like mine. I never took exfoliating seriously and thought it was a feminine thing to do but now that I'm older and wiser, I know better :) My wife has commented on how much better my skin looks and I can feel it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shamsul Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Great For Scrubbing and a Pre-Shave Prep
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about one year, and it is excellent. Always leaves my face leaving clean and my skin soft. I use it before shaving also for a great pre-shave prep.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan K.

customer_reviews.title: Fancy jar and no better than soap
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting better and the granulars didn't make me feel like my face was getting any cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Tee Squared

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. This facial cleanser provides a deep cleaning but is not at all harsh. Very impressed with the results....
customer_reviews.author: Russ lilly

product_meta.title: RUGGED & DAPPER Daily Face Wash and Scrub Cleanser for Men, 8 ounces
feature_bullets: Formulated for Men: Deep cleans, attacks dirt, excess oil and grime to eliminate breakouts and acne, without stripping the skin of moisture.
Multi-Purpose Benefits: Energizing Face Wash, Toner and Exfoliator that covers all the bases, for a clean and revitalized complexion.
Highly Effective Formula: Prevents congestion and the advancement of aging. Plant-based exfoliants remove dead skin cells, smooth and prepare the skin for a clean shave.
Natural & Organic: Nutrient-rich ingredients borrowed from the outdoors release potent vitamins and minerals to regenerate skin. Includes: Aloe Vera, Vitamin C, Willow Bark and Burdock Root.
For All Ages & Most Skin Types: Normal, sensitive, oily, rough, dry, combo and acne-prone complexions.
